data.message:
so let me get this straight
did an alltime great just slate
that america can’t be great 
because trump is now the new head of state
but Em’s been locked up behind a gate
trying to decide his own fucking fate
he attacks his own fans and all their traits
putting out a message so full of hate
he implies we all collaborate 
with the fucking general electorate 
that made obama need to vacate
and gave trump the fucking reason 
he needed to go and fkn celebrate 
am i getting this straight?! 
you came back too late
you’re starting to degenerate
the Stans will probably validate
but the rest will emigrate 
while you sit there and vegetate
writing words that fucking aggravate 
no creativity to demonstrate
so fuck your irate legislate
you just irritate 
sit your arse down there and you better fucking wait
you put too much shit on your plate
if we want art we’ll visit the tate
do us a favour and hibernate
while i demonstrate 
what it’s like to captivate
make all these heads rotate
you gravitate to me when i motivate
make the whole room FUCKING levitate
you cant begin to compensate 
you WERE a god back in 98
BUT NOW the world sees that you ain’t so great
shoulda got off the stage before it was too late 
now you can mark your calendar with a new date
a two zero one and carry the 8  
YOUR THRONE IS MINE WHEN YOU abdicate
YOU’LL listen to eX when you masturbate
and hear MY voice when you ejaculate
MAKE you realise you can’t spit no more
while you sit there watching me salivate
